definition: Taxol (a.k.a. Paclitaxel), mitotic inhibitor used in cancer chemotherapy

sentences.english: Why should cattle not graze near yew trees?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼牛不在紫杉附近喫草？

sentences.english: The use of an inducible expression system resulted in an increase of taxadiene accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 使用一種誘導表達系統，導致增加了紫杉積累。

sentences.english: Patients also might receive a taxane instead of oxaliplatin.
sentences.chinese: 患者也有可能接受紫杉醇而非奧沙利鉑治療。

sentences.english: IGF pathway inhibition sensitizes drug-resistant ovarian carcinoma cells to Taxol.
sentences.chinese: 抑制IGF通路可使耐藥腫瘤細胞重新對紫杉醇敏感。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the therapeutic effects of Palitaxel and Ifosfamide for malignant gynecological tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察紫杉醇與異環磷酰胺治療婦科腫瘤的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiangiogenesis ability of Paclitaxel.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討紫杉醇的抗血管生成作用。

sentences.english: The yew hedges muffled the sound of the men's footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 紫杉樹籬使兩人的腳步聲聽上去發悶。

sentences.english: He's the fellow who discovered the fungus which produces the anti-cancer drug Taxol.
sentences.chinese: 他是誰的研究員發現了真菌產生的抗癌藥物紫杉醇。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the sensitivity of hyperthermia at different temperatures to taxotere and its mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討不同溫熱對多西紫杉醇增敏的規律及其機制。

sentences.english: Beneath those rugged elms, that yew-tree's shade.
sentences.chinese: 那些粗糙的老榆樹下，紫杉蔭裏。

sentences.english: At present, paclitaxel plus carboplatin become the first-line chemotherapeutic regimen of advanced EOC.
sentences.chinese: 紫杉醇加卡鉑是晚期EOC的標準一線化療方案。

sentences.english: The paclitaxel-coated balloons used in this trial were standard angioplasty balloons.
sentences.chinese: 本試驗以紫杉醇塗層球囊爲血管成形術球囊標準。

sentences.english: That kind of penetration is only achieved with the British yew longbow.
sentences.chinese: 其穿透性達到了英國紫杉長弓的水平。

sentences.english: Docetaxel is a newly developed taxoid anticancer agent.
sentences.chinese: 多西他賽是新的紫杉類抗癌藥物。

sentences.english: Bugsy loves the water so much that Yew has trouble keeping up.
sentences.chinese: 中的愛的水，它是如此的有困難，保持紫杉。

sentences.english: Drug resistance is the main restriction factor for clinical usage of taxanes.
sentences.chinese: 耐藥是影響紫杉類藥物臨牀療效的重要因素。

definition: Phoebe zhennan/Machilus nanmu/Chinese cedar/Chinese giant redwood
Chinese ash (Fraxinus chinensis), whose bark, flowers and leaves are used in TCM
Chinese scholar tree (Sophora japonica)/Japanese pagoda tree
